DUR.AT.summary: Duros S.A. operates as a menswear company in Greece. It offers shirts, polo shirts, knitwear and cardigans, T-shirts, trousers, jackets, suits, blazers, and shoes. The company was founded in 1960 and is based in Patras, Greece.

ELBE.AT.summary: Elve S.A. manufactures and sells uniforms, corporate clothing, accessories, and personal protective equipment in France and internationally. It offers corporate clothes for museums, banks, casinos, hotels, and organizations; and T-shirts, polo shirts, and hoodies for gas stations, telecommunication chain stores, and others. The company also provides labor clothing and accessories, such as jackets, security pants, waterproof clothing, body suits, safety shoes, reflective clothing, accessories, gloves, and hats; and safety clothing and personal protective equipment, including bulletproof vests, warmth and waterproof clothes, safety shoes, accessories, clothing bags, isothermal, gloves, etc. In addition, it invest in and owns 5 solar energy parks with a total power of 5.2 MW. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Kavala, Greece.
